posts.post_content:
Edited to note that card is sold.

This card has a chance to be one of the more well-traveled Lajoies on the B/S/T. I bought it last week from Quan, who acquired it via the B/S/T the week before. I bought it thinking I didn't have a Lajoie/batting with a Piedmont 350 back, but it turns out I do. So I'm offering it for the same price I paid.

Check or money order only. If I know you from the board, I will ship the card the day after we reach a deal to make up for the no-PayPal delay.

Thanks,

Rob

wolfie51sb at aol.com

Rob is selling a Lajoie?

what is the hobby coming to?

Joe,

I guess I'm a flipper at heart. With scans.

Rob
